desc: We make 100% natural sausage casings, from New Zealand Sheep & Hog. We supply home sausage makers, local butchers & sausage manufacturers throughout NZ & the world. We also stock pork fat & sausage making equipment for home sausage makers. Shop our range online today.

layout.text: We make 100% natural sausage casings, from New Zealand Sheep & Hog.
